newsitem.title: USA: Bernard Chaus needs additional financing.
newsitem.headline: Bernard Chaus needs additional financing.

text.p: Bernard Chaus Inc said on Thursday that it needed additional financing to meet its commitments through the end of the current fiscal year.
"The company must obtain additional sources of financing which may be from its existing bank lender, another third party, or a combination of both," the company said in a statement.
In addition, the company said its existing bank lender had waived noncompliance with financial covenants for the period ended March 31, 1997.
Bernard Chaus posted a third quarter net loss of $3.2 million, or $0.12 per share, compared with a net loss of $9.4 million, or $0.36 per share, for the year ago period.
Bernard Chaus designs and arranges for the manufacture of women's career and casual sportswear.
